roleset.name: call names

example.name: your mother wears army boots
example.text: Mr. Stanley is on trial over charges that he violated aproclamation, issued by the South African administrator generalearlier this year, which made it a crime punishable by two years inprison for any person to ``insult, disparate or belittle'' theelection commission.

roleset.note: 'disparate' above is certainly a typo for 'disparage.'
